SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Account for Changed Default Guest Permission Set

The default permission set assigned to storefront guest users adds access to the ccrz.ProductList Visualforce page. This change helps ensure a consistent and uninterrupted storefront experience for unauthenticated users.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

How: If you previously cloned the default guest user permission set—which was named CloudCraze Guest in previous versions—edit your cloned permission set. Include ccrz.ProductList in the Enabled Visualforce Pages list.

If you start using the B2B Commerce Guest permission set for new implementations, this permission is already added—no extra setup is necessary.

title: Accounting for Changed Default Guest Permission Set in Salesforce
